trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Greater Sudbury
There were no other sightings in Greater Sudbury on or around November 8th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI just got out of the hotub on my deck.Im always looking up at night, i work nightshift and i am always looking up for satelites and i always hope one day ill see somthing i will undoubtably decare a ufo. I happened, i dry off from the tub and go inside for about 10 min. I come back out it a cool night and i light a smoke and sit down on the step. I look up and immediatley i see a V shaped line of very dim red amber lights i would think about 7 circular lights per side. I t was about 1000 feet up and very large. to block it from view i would have used about the basketball size object at arms length. It came from direcly over my house and went on in a strait line due east. Abosolutley silent , it covered my sky line in about 7 seconds before it blended in the night sky. My wife caught the tail end of it.When i say lights i dont mean it as we would see lights on a car they were very dim and could easily not be seen by anyone walking it just seemed to blend in with the night sky, yet 100% visible, i couldnt see any sides of it just the circular amber red dim lights. It was alligned in a V shape rather than a boomer rang, it had about 7-9 lights per side wich formed a V that was more of a 60 degree angle. It is my first sighting, i was really taken back, im the kind of guy where i could spin a great tale, but i tell you this was somthing not of this world. Dead silnt as it passed over me and covered my sky line in 7 seconds. I saw it now im questioning what i should do,,, they are here and our goverments probably cant do a thing anyways, they have no need to contact us they can come and go as they wish,,,i am very puzzeled right now about what i should be doing,,, i seen it i believe it and i really feel like i should be trying to expose it to the rest of the world,,, where the hell was it going,,, i ask this because i drive somewhere ive got somthing to do where were they going they obviously have somthing to do they arent just joy riding,,,, this bothers me the most i feel i have to do somthing about this and im inept to do anything except question what they are doing , We are a rich mineral deposited area, gawd i have a tonne of probable reasons but why wont they make themselves known..... i always thought you peeps who report this stuff are wack jobs mabey some of you are ,,, but if u seen what i seen i am certain you are going through what i am going through,,,,
Summary: V shaped massive silent fast and not of this world 100% sure of that.
